Header: Two killed after colliding with a train in Peradeniya
Content: Two people were killed when they were hit by a train near the 69 th mile post between Peradeniya and Pilimathalawa. A 23-year-old resident of Pilimathalawa died after being hit by a train traveling from Polgahawela to Kandy last night. The other person was killed when he was hit by a train traveling from Colombo Fort to Badulla. The police said that they have not identified the victim so far but stated that he was around 50 years old.
